DataElement.preferredName: Neurologic And/Or Cognitive Disorder Symptom Present Degree Type

ValueDomain.preferredName: Neurologic And/Or Cognitive Disorder Level Type
ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Pertaining to nerves or the nervous system._Used to indicate that either or both of two items or options may be valid._A category of psychiatric disorders which are characterized by a deficit in cognition or memory._A position on a scale measuring intensity, quality, or amount._Something distinguishable as an identifiable class based on common qualities.

PermissibleValues.value: Mild, no significant interference with normal activity

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Negation Significant Interference Normal Physical Activity Mild
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: An operation in which a term denies or inverts the meaning of another term or construction._A term applied to differences, correlations, cause-and-effect relationships, etc., to indicate that they are noticeable, probably too closely correlated to be attributed to chance and therefore indicating a systematic relation: substantial, fairly large; also having consequence or import, important in effect or meaning. In statistics significant ordinarily indicates a probability of not less than 95 percent, while highly significant indicates a probability of not less than 99 percent._The act of hindering or obstructing or impeding._Being approximately average or within certain limits; conforming with or constituting a norm or standard or level or type or social norm._Any form of exercise or movement. Physical activity may include planned activity such as walking, running, basketball, or other sports. Physical activity may also include other daily activities such as household chores, yard work, walking the dog, etc._Gentle or temperate in nature or degree.

Concepts.definition: An operation in which a term denies or inverts the meaning of another term or construction.

A term applied to differences, correlations, cause-and-effect relationships, etc., to indicate that they are noticeable, probably too closely correlated to be attributed to chance and therefore indicating a systematic relation: substantial, fairly large; also having consequence or import, important in effect or meaning. In statistics significant ordinarily indicates a probability of not less than 95 percent, while highly significant indicates a probability of not less than 99 percent.
The act of hindering or obstructing or impeding.
Being approximately average or within certain limits; conforming with or constituting a norm or standard or level or type or social norm.

Any form of exercise or movement. Physical activity may include planned activity such as walking, running, basketball, or other sports. Physical activity may also include other daily activities such as household chores, yard work, walking the dog, etc.
Gentle or temperate in nature or degree.

PermissibleValues.value: Prominent, significant interference with normal activity

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Significant Interference Normal Physical Activity Outstanding

In statistics significant ordinarily indicates a probability of not less than 95 percent, while highly significant indicates a probability of not less than 99 percent._The act of hindering or obstructing or impeding._Being approximately average or within certain limits; conforming with or constituting a norm or standard or level or type or social norm._Any form of exercise or movement. Physical activity may include planned activity such as walking, running, basketball, or other sports. Physical activity may also include other daily activities such as household chores, yard work, walking the dog, etc._Superior or excellent in nature.

Concepts.definition: A term applied to differences, correlations, cause-and-effect relationships, etc., to indicate that they are noticeable, probably too closely correlated to be attributed to chance and therefore indicating a systematic relation: substantial, fairly large; also having consequence or import, important in effect or meaning. In statistics significant ordinarily indicates a probability of not less than 95 percent, while highly significant indicates a probability of not less than 99 percent.
The act of hindering or obstructing or impeding.
Being approximately average or within certain limits; conforming with or constituting a norm or standard or level or type or social norm.

Any form of exercise or movement. Physical activity may include planned activity such as walking, running, basketball, or other sports. Physical activity may also include other daily activities such as household chores, yard work, walking the dog, etc.
Superior or excellent in nature.
